Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
I need to finish eating and get back to work as
soon as possible!

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
When it comes to food, I'm not picky at all. As
long as I can eat it quickly, that's good enough
for me.

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
Excuse me, what are you up to this late at
night?!

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
Oh my, we're running out of firewood... What
are the other maids doing?!

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
It's very hard to deal with our lady. She's always
going out of her way to be selfish!

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
If our lady won't stop being selfish, I have an
idea...
<PAGE>
...and I ought to keep quiet about it in front of
outsiders. Pardon me...

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
*sigh* Is this all I have to look forward to?
Catering to my lady's every whim for the rest of
my life?

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
I feel like our lady has become much more
thoughtful these days.

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
I was sick of our lady's selfishness, but now that
she's more self-sufficient, I almost feel lonely
sometimes...

<NAME_MOB_MATILDA>
Now that our lady's not barking at the other
maids anymore, they're all getting lazy! I should
scold them!
